Acrobat.name: 特技演员 Acrobat
Acrobat.description:
特技演员 Acrobat

你接受过训练以展现那些让人难以置信、宛若超人的优雅技巧。你的步伐让敌人疲于应对、找不到北，每一场战斗都被你化为一场艺术表演。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aFygWxgSv82WyCsl]{特技演员入门 Acrobat Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 特技达到受训熟练度

你的特技技能的熟练度变为专家。在7级时，特技的熟练度变为大师；在15级时，熟练度变为传奇。当你进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{翻滚 Tumble Through}通过敌人所占据的空间时，若特技检定的结果为大成功，则不会将敌人占据的空间视为困难地形。

特殊 直至选取另外两个特技演员变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JO3mcFvxjRp1V8XK]{柔术演员 Contortionist} 专长 4

先决条件 特技演员入门

你能以惊人的速度从窘迫的局势中脱出，在那些想要压制你的敌人面前赢取优势。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3G8xUlgCjRmRJNfP]{迅速穿越 Quick Squeeze} 专长，而且若你在特技上的熟练度达到大师的话，则能够以完整速度@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{挤入空间 Squeeze}。

每当你成功使用特技技能@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}，被你逃脱的生物在对抗你所做出的下一次攻击时会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}，但此攻击必须在你的下个回合结束前作出。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0qGLCpggCcOVkbtT]{特技闪避 Dodge Away} 专长 6

先决条件 特技演员入门

触发 你是近战攻击的目标

需求 你能意识到攻击，且未处于@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}

你用特技技巧来躲避攻击，若你愿意的话，还可以借此闪避的势头来让自己保持运动。

你的AC在对抗触发攻击时获得+1环境加值。若攻击未能命中你，那么你能在此次打击后进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步 Step}。

若你的特技熟练度为大师，则能够在此次快步中移动10尺以取代正常的5尺。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.63sSYk5yqiAyZGb9]{优雅飞跃 Graceful Leaper} 专长 7

先决条件 特技演员入门, 特技达到大师熟练度

当你跳起来的时候，肌肉和重力都失去了意义；只有优雅和平衡才是最重要的。

在进行 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump}或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}时，你能投掷特技检定以取代正常的运动检定。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jfsmtOx4QgXB19BL]{翻越一击 Tumbling Strike} 专长 8

先决条件 特技演员入门

需求 你与一名敌人相邻

尝试一次特技检定对抗与你相邻敌人的反射DC。

大成功 你移动穿过敌人所占据的空间，抵达与你初始位置相对、位于敌人另一侧的无主空间。此次移动不会触发反应动作。你移动的距离不能超过自身速度，而且你停止移动的位置必须与你穿过的那个敌人相邻。在移动后，你作出一次打击对抗你刚刚穿过的那名敌人，此敌人在对抗本次打击时陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

成功 同大成功，但是敌人在对抗此次打击时没有陷入措手不及。

失败 你仍处于原本所在的空间，但可以进行打击。

大失败 无任何效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Yazy4gex46FLwsph]{翻越巧袭 Tumbling Opportunist} 专长 10

先决条件 特技演员入门

频率 每分钟一次

需求 你最近作出的动作是 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{翻滚Tumble Through}或 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jfsmtOx4QgXB19BL]{翻越一击 Tumbling Strike}，而且你成功穿过了敌人占据的空间。

你利用穿过敌人时所产生的速度，并借力展现出惊险的特技技巧，潇洒地将翻倒的敌人留在身后。你尝试对刚刚被自己穿越了占据空间的敌人进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}。你能在此次检定中使用特技取代运动技能。

Animal Trainer.name: Animal Trainer
Animal Trainer.description:
Animal Trainer

You have befriended an animal to serve as an able assistant and loyal guardian.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.m3ANSHYfBrFyFUvo]{Animal Trainer Dedication } 专长 2

先决条件 Trained in Nature

You gain the services of a young animal companion that travels with you and obeys simple commands as best as it can. This trained animal is trained in Performance instead of the skill listed for its type.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the animal trainer变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.J8BSHRkmP3QLknwF]{Beast Speaker} 专长 4

先决条件 Animal Trainer Dedication

You constantly have the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals} as a 2nd-level innate primal spell. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make a Request of animals while this spell is active.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n3eOMWQd4kdR3A0l]{Mature Trained Companion } 专长 6

先决条件 Animal Trainer Dedication

Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to expert instead of one of the three skill increases for mature. It gains the Mesmerizing Performance advanced maneuver, rather than the normal advanced maneuver for its type.

@Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.jwo5CvftA5puYp7i]{Mesmerizing Performance}

需求 The companion's last action was a successful Performance check to Perform.

The companion maintains its performance to captivate a single target within 30 feet that witnessed its successful performance. The target must attempt a Will save.

成功 The target is unaffected and temporarily immune for 1 hour

Failure The target is fascinated by the companion for its next action and then is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Critical Failure The target is fascinated by the companion for 1 round. While it remains fascinated, it can't use reactions.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rhVL28qFl760qJQe]{Insistent Command} 专长 8

先决条件 Master in Nature, Animal Trainer Dedication

When you roll a success to Command an Animal, you get a critical success; if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AvN95M5eVLLEu2qk]{Splendid Companion } 专长 12

先决条件 Mature Trained Companion

Your animal companion continues to develop. It becomes a nimble or savage animal companion (your choice), gaining abilities determined by its type. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to master instead of Athletics or Acrobatics.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hdt3RHZljLrO49kq]{Specialized Companion } 专长 18

先决条件 Splendid Companion

The animal companion you gain from the Animal Trainer Dedication feat gains one specialization of your choice. Increase its proficiency rank in Performance to legendary instead of one of the specialization's skill increases.

Archaeologist.name: 考古学家 Archaeologist
Archaeologist.description:
考古学家 Archaeologist

冒险者们为了利益而洗劫墓穴，而考古学家则将从遗址中获取的知识视为珍宝。要达成你的目标，你需要进行学术研讨，通过训练来攻克先民和敌人设置的机关陷阱，进行魔法训练，或者再加上一点点运气加身。

补充专长 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oA866uVEFu1OrAX0]{寻找陷阱 Trap Finder}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ar6W97iun6yYI8Df]{延迟陷阱 Delay Trap}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PRKe5rWYZMZgEpFU]{考古学家入门 Archaeologist Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 察觉、社群和贼活达到受训熟练度

你是民俗与历史的学徒，追求着来自过往时光的知识与文物。你的社群和贼活的熟练度变为专家，而且在关于古代历史、民族和文化的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}检定中获得+1环境加值。

特殊 直至选取另外两个考古学家变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AuIE19F9rY3YvXf6]{学术魔法 Magical Scholastics} 专长 4

先决条件 考古学家入门

尽管学习是通往成功的关键，但稍微懂一些魔法也能助你挖掘过往的秘密。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic}，@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{神导术 Guidance}和@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{阅读灵光 Read Aura}作为异能内在戏法。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.R7BO8br4BjCmpjit]{聚居地学者 Settlement Scholastics} 专长 6

先决条件 考古学家入门

你通过学习开拓视野。你在关于某个特定定居点的学识（Lore）技能上变为专家；若你已经在上述学识技能上受训，则可以根据自身选择在一个不同定居点上对应的学识技能变为受训。选择一个在此定居点内流行的常见或罕见的语言。你学会该语言。

特殊 你可以多次选取该专长。每当你选取该专长时，选择一个不同的定居点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.g3zmkEVJJIjE32fY]{学术鉴别法 Scholastic Identification} 专长 7

先决条件 考古学家入门, 社群达到大师熟练度

你拥有理解古代文本和文物的必要知识。

无论你正在研究的文本类型，你都能在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{解译文书 Deciphering Writing}时使用社群技能。

你还能在研究具有文化意义的魔法物品或地点时，使用社群技能@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{辨识魔法 Identify Magic}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dmXd68ilbuGR6eUP]{考古学家的强运 Archaeologist's Luck} 专长 8

先决条件 考古学家入门

频率 每小时一次

触发 你在对抗陷阱的检定中失败，比如用贼活@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{解除 Disable}陷阱检定或者用反射豁免回避陷阱的效果。

你可不仅仅是技术过人；你那追寻过往秘密的动力表现在某种奇异的好运上。重掷失败的检定并应用新的结果。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ErKwliHplziJY2BW]{高等学术魔法 Greater Magical Scholastics} 专长 10

先决条件 考古学家入门, 学术魔法

你拓展了自身在魔法上的研究，这让你能够找到正确的道路、寻找物体和在那些不法之徒面前隐藏物体。

你能施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{卜筮术 Augury}，@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{定位术 Locate}和@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{回避侦测 Nondetection} 作为异能内在法术，每个法术每日可以施放一次。你只能将回避侦测法术应用至物体上，而且该法术会自动升阶至与你在学术魔法中获得的戏法相同的环级。

Archer.name: 射手 Archer
Archer.description:
射手 Archer

任何种类的弓都是强大的武器。无论是将军还是猎户都能意识到躲在掩体之后从远距离造成杀伤的威力。那些专注于弓箭的人――无论是神秘的披风客还是无情的狙击手――通常都会被视为应当尊重和恐惧的结合体。与任何其他专擅武器的大师一样，射手的技能是通过大量练习和积累经验铸成的。一名真正的射手能与手中的弓箭合二为一，完成大多数人认为使用这件武器不可能做到的事情，或者说大多数认为只有靠着魔法才能完成的伟业。

补充专长 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{援助射击 Assisting Shot}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{近程射击 Point-Blank Shot}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PwcmmJOLY8C9JHau]{二重射击 Double Shot}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4PvmSnyp3URIqJUM]{回马箭 Parting Shot}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{移动装填 Running Reload}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hkdP5tsTAoqJDR8v]{三重射击 Triple Shot}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rByA8NDI6ZtNgBeT]{巧射姿态 Mobile Shot Stance}; 18级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{多重射击姿态 Multishot Stance}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4QFElZoWjg1X0vsg]{射手入门 Archer Dedication} 专长 2

你在所有弓弩武器组中的简易和军用武器熟练度上变为受训。每当你从职业特性中获得熟练度提升，将弓弩武器组中的部分武器熟练度提升至专家或更高时，你在弓弩武器组中的所有简易和军用武器的熟练度等级均会提升至相应等级。若你正在使用的弓弩的熟练度等级至少达到了专家，则会获得此弓弩的重击专精效果。

特殊 直至选取另外两个射手变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xRTlbvvBzURgC6M2]{快速射击 Quick Shot} 专长 4

先决条件 射手入门

你在同一个动作里取出弓箭并发起攻击。你进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact}取出一件弓弩武器组的武器，该武器必须已经装填或装填为0，之后用该武器进行打击。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7RcCvziQBLL7Bumu]{进阶弓训练 Advanced Bow Training} 专长 6

先决条件 射手入门

通过持续不断地进行严苛的练习，你加强了使用进阶弓的技巧。你获得所有进阶弓的熟练度，就好像这些武器是弓弩武器组中的军用武器一般。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Xhphe5Lsa4kuU4RG]{可怖之弩 Crossbow Terror} 专长 6

先决条件 射手入门

你对弩有着极强的热情。

你使用@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.62nnVQvGhoVLLl2K]{弩 Crossbows}造成的伤害获得+2环境加值。

若你的弩是简易武器，那么你在使用这个弩作出的攻击所造成的伤害骰增大1级。与通常情况一样，此伤害骰增大不可与其他增大武器伤害骰的能力叠加，比如游侠的@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CpjN7v1QN8TQFcvI]{王牌弩手 Crossbow Ace}专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.egmb8p3ZIYtx5aQN]{屏息瞄准 Archer's Aim} 专长 8

先决条件 射手入门

你放慢呼吸、集中精神、谨慎地发射弹药。使用弓弩武器组的武器作出一次远程打击。你的攻击检定获得+2环境加值，并且忽略目标的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。若目标在@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}状态，则由于藏匿而引起的纯骰检定DC从11降低至5。

Artillerist.name: Artillerist
Artillerist.description:
Artillerist

The artillerist's maxim holds that while fights might be won with swords, battles are won with cannons. Or in a pinch, with trebuchets, siege towers, catapults, hwachas, and all other lethal miscellanea of a combat engineers' corp. As a true artillerist, you leave the penny-ante pistols and knives to those who only need to operate on a small scale. You're a consummate professional in the art of big guns, a maestro at merging mathematics and manpower to transform whatever castle wall, infantry battalion, or rampaging dragon offends you into a smoking crater in the ground.

You're not just some daredevil demolitionist, though. You're part of a team, accustomed to coordinating with your unit to maximize your time and effectiveness. Whether jumping in to help your crew load the next round, quickly calculating the trajectory of the engine's next shot, or taking the shot yourself, your presence on the team ensures their chances of success are maximized, creating a whole that is greater than the sum of its parts.

Leading with a Cannon

A proper artillerist is more than an engineer, though their skills in that field certainly shouldn't be underestimated. When a war becomes unavoidable, the presence of knights and pikemen might decide a skirmish or battle, but a well-trained artillerist with a reliable squad and a few good siege weapons can make the difference between prolonged months of battle with countless lives lost and a shorter, less bloody affair with fewer deaths and a more lasting victory.

Castles and fortifications are critical tools for holding land in a world full of empires, kingdoms, and duchies all vying for power. Many wars are won or lost not based on the military might of either side, but on a castle's ability to withstand an extended siege. Without a team of engineers capable of penetrating a castle or keep's defenses, the occupants can wait out an invading force for as long as they have enough food and water to keep their citizens and defenders healthy and fed. Many wars have been “won” when the besieged force manages to last through a single winter. Besieging armies whose supply lines break down due to snow-clogged passes or insufficient cold weather gear are forced to retreat due to losses from poor hygiene or hypothermia long before attrition has had an opportunity to impact their opponents.

An artillerist changes this dynamic, completely rewriting the rules of war. Rather than time being on the side of the besieged, it becomes the tool of the besieger. Each day that passes while a skilled artillerist hammers the castle walls with cannon fire and catapult stones brings the fortifications ever closer to crumbling down. Some wise nobles and warlords who realize their opponents have brought siege weapons, especially powerful black powder siege weapons like cannons, will choose to negotiate surrender before battle is even started, recognizing an inevitable defeat that can be staved off temporarily by sacrificing many soldiers but not thwarted without outside intervention.

Ruthless or evil artillerists, or the warlords they follow, might take things a step further, specifically targeting granaries to starve enemies out or launching rotting food, corpses, or diseased livestock into parts of the town near water sources. As food and water supplies dwindle, so too does the morale of the castle's inhabitants and defenders. Even a stubborn noble or warlord will find it hard to continue resisting a siege when their own troops mutiny and their citizens begin seeking a way out.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.txWKzKuJus7UBebX]{Artillerist Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in martial weapons

Artillery is a team sport, where every member of the crew has to rely on the other members. At best, a mistake might just waste time. At worst, a misaligned fuse or a badly set pin could cause the whole thing to explode. You've taken these lessons to heart, and so your presence on an artillery team assists the entire team at every aspect of the siege weapon's deployment and usage. If you're serving on a siege weapon crew, you and all other members gain a +2 circumstance bonus to any checks to Load, Aim, move, or Repair the weapon. When you Aim a siege weapon, you can move the weapon's aim twice as far as normal.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained at least two other feats from the artillerist变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7WBIXGqZbAKbqEU6]{Named Artillery} 专长 4

先决条件 trained in Crafting

It is a tradition among artillerists to name the siege weapon most important to them and closest to their heart—much as a sailor on a ship, the weapon is their livelihood. You've gone a step further, and you always make sure that your named artillery has the best possible maintenance and upkeep. You can spend a full day adjusting and working on a single siege weapon to designate it as your named artillery. The siege weapon you designated as your named artillery gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, Fortitude saves, and Reflex saves as well as additional Hit Points equal to twice your level.

During your daily preparations, you must spend at least one hour on maintenance to service your named artillery. If you fail to do so, or if you spend a full day designating a new piece of named artillery, the previous named artillery loses any benefits from this feat. Only one artillerist can designate a particular siege weapon as their named artillery, even if several artillerists are serving on the same siege weapon's crew (though it's typically more efficient for a group with several artillerists to divide them up, assigning one to each siege weapon).

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IeRX0tGbeOF0ev08]{Shorthanded} 专长 4

Typically, a siege weapon is meant to be run by a crew with a very specific minimum number of members designed to ensure that your crew can account for every possible variable and necessity in loading, aiming, and firing the weapon. In a pinch, however, you can operate it with fewer people, provided you know what you're doing. You can operate a siege weapon with fewer than the minimum number of crew, at an increasing penalty. You and your crew take a -2 penalty to checks to Load, Aim, Launch, move, or Repair the weapon for each person below the minimum crew. The maximum number of missing minimum crew members you can handle with this feat is 5. For example, if a siege weapon had a minimum crew size of 8, you would still need a crew of 3, and you would take a -10 penalty when doing so.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pph43ZrfvEnQjJXE]{Cannon Corner Shot} 专长 6

By loading special ammunition in a particular way, you can make your siege weapons do all manner of tricks that other siege engineers can barely even imagine. If you personally contribute an additional Load action to the siege weapon's loading, above the minimum, you can change a burst into a line twice as long as the size of the burst, or vice versa (so a 10-foot burst turns into a 20-foot line, or a 20-foot line turns into a 10-foot burst).

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.moXYfz806x6uXIW9]{Field Artillery} 专长 6

先决条件 expert in Crafting

While castles are generally obliging enough to stay in one place, out in the field positioning is of paramount importance—a gun in the wrong place is worse than useless. You can Interact with an adjacent mounted siege weapon to increase its Speed by 10 feet for one round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ivSf8wSIUkK8gwej]{Live Ammunition} 专长 8

There are generally few things as ill-advised as being shot out of a cannon or launched by a trebuchet, but people use the tactic every so often in a desperate situation. While it's more humane to use this strategy with mindless constructs or undead, occasionally an exceedingly foolhardy adventurer demands the opportunity to try it. Loading a creature requires two additional Load actions, which you must conduct personally. The creature must be willing, unconscious, or restrained throughout the process, and the siege weapon must be physically capable of firing the creature in question, based on their size and shape. Typically, that means ballistas don't qualify, for example—nor do auto-catapults which require specifically-sized balls—but normal catapults and onagers work just fine. When you Launch the weapon, if the weapon usually targets an area, you target a single 5-foot square instead. The siege weapon deals its normal damage to its target, or to the modified area, and to the creature fired.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kVSZQvsz1cYjOwxL]{Master Siege Engineer} 专长 16

What you don't know about artillery isn't worth knowing and your mastery allows you to perform an impossible number of actions as part of a siege weapon's crew. You're permanently quickened. You can only use the extra action to Aim or Launch a siege weapon.

Assassin.name: 刺客 Assassin
Assassin.description:
刺客 Assassin

通过潜行和诡计抹杀目标是刺客的专长。尽管刺客善于杀生而且可能是恶人，但也有一部分刺客遵循着某种道德准则，猎杀恶人、暴徒或沉溺于权力或侵害他人却不受约束的个体。

补充专长：4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0lieFKdwgNVXep7u]{毒素抗力 Poison Resistance}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{涂毒武器 Poison Weapon}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bCAvo59b5RyW12iI]{偷袭者 Sneak Attacker}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{精通涂毒武器 Improved Poison Weapon}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iBmqKjsq4iTtoqvl]{刺客入门 Assassin Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 制作炼金物品; 在手艺、欺骗和隐秘技能上达到受训熟练度

你受过如何暗杀敌人的训练，而你能耐着性子准确地收割生命。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{死亡标记 Mark for Death}行动。

特殊 直至选取另外两个刺客变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OQAo3Us0ODGYdNNn]{背刺专家 Expert Backstabber} 专长 4

先决条件 刺客入门

当你使用具有背刺武器特性的武器对@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}的敌人进行打击时，你会造成2点额外精准伤害以取代1点。

若该武器为+3武器，你能造成4点额外精准伤害以取代2点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.io6eJGrw701WbmYe]{突然袭击 Surprise Attack} 专长 4

先决条件 刺客入门

你在敌人作出反应之前便下手了。在战斗的第一轮，若你以欺骗或隐秘检定投掷先攻，则还未行动的生物对你来说均被视为陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3poGYUYCBTmbeCUs]{告死天使 Angel Of Death} 专长 10

先决条件 刺客入门

你对被@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{死亡标记 Marked for Death} 所标记的生物作出的所有@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strikes }均被视为具有死亡特征，这使得目标在生命值被你降至0点时会立即被杀死。

若有生物被如此杀死，那么尝试与其沟通、使其复活或将其转化为不死生物或其他扰乱目标来世的行为均会失败，除非上述效果的反制等级比你在杀死目标生物时的等级一半更高（向上取整），或者上述效果来源于神器或神祇。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iJxbrXAdxhLqdT5E]{暗杀 Assassinate} 专长 12

先决条件 刺客入门

需求 你已经使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{死亡标记 Mark for Death} 进行了标记，且标记目标完全没有注意到你。

你以极为迅捷的动作发起攻击，试图立即取走标记目标的性命。作出一次打击对抗你的标记目标。若命中，你的标记目标额外承受[[/r {6d6}[precision]]]{6d6精准伤害}，并以一次基础强韧豁免对抗你的职业DC或法术DC，以较高者为准。若标记目标掷出大失败便会死亡。这是个失能效果。目标会在一天内临时免疫你的暗杀。

Bastion.name: 盾卫 Bastion
Bastion.description:
盾卫 Bastion

有人说适宜的进攻是最好的防御，但你会发现这么自夸的人基本都有那么些目中无人。根据你的经验，最好的防御就是在你和敌人之间架起一面精良、坚固的盾牌。你专注于训练如何使用盾牌来更好地保护自己和身边的人。

补充专长 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tHqlcgcxHXzqLHPZ]{盾护步法 Shielded Stride}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{反射之盾(战士) Reflexive Shield}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5vXc2s2siR1ihpBT]{盾牌戒卫(战士) Shield Warden (Fighter)}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pRqcm5P2ZFihSpVI]{快速盾牌格挡 Quick Shield Block}; 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kQEIPYoKTt69yXxV]{镜反之盾 Mirror Shield}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.s6wXcQYmHbew14gC]{盾卫入门 Bastion Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 盾牌格挡

你很擅长在战斗中使用盾牌。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.w8Ycgeq2zfyshtoS]{反射持盾 Reactive Shield}专长。这会如常满足任何要求反射持盾的先决条件。

特殊 直至选取另外两个盾卫变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dSSwRyuhKTq1VubX]{卸武格挡 Disarming Block} 专长 4

先决条件 盾卫入门, 运动达到受训熟练度

触发 你用盾牌格挡了一次由手持武器作出的近战打击。

你尝试对使用武器攻击你的生物进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}，卸除的目标武器是被格挡的那件。即便你的手都被占用，也可以这么做。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sKuhYCfCbXeRWivv]{惯用持盾手 Nimble Shield Hand} 专长 6

先决条件 盾卫入门

你是如此习惯于使用盾牌，以至于即便在手上抓着东西做其他事情时也能用好盾牌。

在判断@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact}动作时，你用于持握盾牌的那只手被视为空着的手。你可以在这只手中持握其他物体（但你仍旧无法用它来持握武器）。

这些好处对塔盾无效，因为此类盾牌过于笨重了。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dY0jhJOEj6DHc0ud]{破坏性格挡 Destructive Block} 专长 10

先决条件 盾卫入门

你能更有效地保护自己，但代价是牺牲你的盾牌。

当你进行 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block}时，你能够降低自身受到的伤害，数值为盾牌硬度的2倍，但如果你这么做，盾牌便会承受原本正常所会受伤害量的2倍（在应用其硬度之前）。

若你的盾牌无法破损或被破坏，比如你在使用的是@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.SUbYk6B1iPoGyyjh]{不破坚盾 Indestructible Shield}时，你就无法使用破坏性格挡。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4bB3N36DmqllGJNx]{留存盾牌 Shield Salvation} 专长 12

先决条件 盾卫入门

你能从完全的破坏中把盾牌保留下来，即便在它经受了毁灭性的攻击后也如此。若1面盾牌将要在你使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block}时由于承受伤害而被破坏，该盾牌会剩余1点生命值作为替代。

它的结构会变得很脆弱，需要你花费时间将其修复，所以直至你下次进行准备为止，均无法使用留存盾牌来再次保留相同的盾牌。

Beast Gunner.name: Beast Gunner
Beast Gunner.description:
Beast Gunner

Rarity uncommon

The art of creating the weapons most commonly referred to as “beast guns” is truly ancient, with the first iterations of the weapons created on the continent of Arcadia well over 10,000 years ago. This means that beast guns predate all other forms of firearm crafting in Arcadia, even the legendary star guns, whose secrets have been lost to the ages. The tradition of designing beast guns has persisted throughout Arcadia well into the modern era, though it has become increasingly rare as the proliferation of classic firearms and the prestige associated with star guns has allowed more people access to equivalent destructive power without the intense requirements behind crafting a beast gun. However, beast gunners remain virtually unknown outside of Arcadia.

The art of bonding to a beast gun and gaining the full magic of a beast gunner is an extended ritual with multiple steps, beginning with the hunt. A person seeking to bond to a beast gun typically does so with a brand new weapon made after they hunt down the creature themselves. This involves telling the story of the hunt, the beast, and the weapon created from the hunted creature. Finally, the weapon is carefully modified and tailored to ensure a proper bond between the beast gun and the prospective beast gunner. However, it's also possible to bond to an heirloom beast gun passed down through the generations by adding symbolic fresh components from the same kind of creature, after performing the same ritual hunt necessary to forge a new weapon with the intent of establishing a bond.

To perform the ritual the prospective beast gunner must first plan a hunt to slay the creature corresponding to the beast gun, whether they wish to bond with a brand new beast gun or establish a link to an old beast gun. Typically, these ritualized hunts can include up to five assistants plus hunting beasts like canines or birds who help corner the beast and bring it down. If the assistants are significantly more powerful than the hunted creature, or if there are so many assistants the creature never stood a chance at survival, the magic simply fails during the bonding process and the hunt and organic materials are wasted, usually much to the shame and chagrin of the hunter. The same doesn't apply if the prospective beast gunner hunts the creature alone, even if they are significantly more powerful than the creature, such that the creature never stood a chance against them in a one on one fight.

You're one of those who successfully completed the hunt and bonded with your prized weapon. Now, you seek to discover the hidden depths that others who think they know how to use beast guns can only imagine.

Choosing Your Beast Gun

A beast gunner's bond with their beast gun is deep and mystical, so if you hope to be a successful beast gunner, it's important to choose a beast gun that suits your temperament, magic, and combat style. For example, if you favor strength and intimidation, a screech shooter is the right choice for you, whereas a spider gun might be optimal if you prefer a more careful style of setting up the battlefield in advance. Similarly, a tentacle cannon is slow and methodical and can hold an enemy in place at close range, while a drake rifle is energetic and mobile and can be used to attack from a great distance. Each beast gun has a personality and magical abilities that attract people who value them. For this reason, some experienced beast gunners say the weapon chooses you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.L1gD3VMD5X9JNJzE]{Beast Gunner Dedication} 专长 6

先决条件 expert with at least one type of firearm, you own a beast gun and have slain the type of creature associated with your beast gun in a fair hunt (see above); trained in Arcana and Crafting

You've bonded to your beast gun and unlocked the first hints of its hidden potential. You treat all beast guns as martial firearms when determining your proficiency with them, even beast guns that are normally advanced weapons. You can change your bonded beast gun to another beast gun you own each day during your daily preparations, as long as you've previously performed a ritual hunt associated with the new beast gun.

The beast gun also acts as a conduit, drawing out and amplifying any latent or active magic power you have. You learn to cast spontaneous spells and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with one cantrip of your choice, from either the arcane or primal spell list. You choose this cantrip from the common spells on your chosen spell list or from other spells you have access to on the list. This cantrip must require a spell attack roll. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane or primal spells, whichever of the two traditions you chose. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

If you already cast arcane or primal spells from spell slots, you learn one additional cantrip from that tradition. If you're a prepared caster, you can prepare this spell in addition to your usual cantrips per day; if you're a spontaneous caster, you add this cantrip to your spell repertoire.

You also gain @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VNuOwXIHafSLHvsZ]{Spellsling}.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gtHTr77BkK4CckEH]{Basic Beast Gunner Spellcasting} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.L1gD3VMD5X9JNJzE]{Beast Gunner Dedication}

You've unlocked the first secrets of beast guns, granting you the power of their synergistic magic.You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire, either a common spell of your chosen tradition or another spell of that tradition you've learned or discovered.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SE38R6zpv2XelzZk]{Call Gun} 专长 8*

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BwDIwjHasZwcd61Z]{Spellshot Dedication}

* This version of the Call Gun feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SE38R6zpv2XelzZk]{original feat}.

You build a powerful magical connection with a chosen gun or crossbow, gaining the ability to conjure it directly to your hand from any distant location. During your daily preparations, choose a single crossbow or firearm. Until your next daily preparations, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ESMIHOOahLQoqxW1]{Call Gun} action to call the gun to your hand.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bJc477EbUYW2TlBx]{Drain Vitality} 专长 10

Frequency once per minute

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.L1gD3VMD5X9JNJzE]{Beast Gunner Dedication}

需求 You're wielding your bonded beast gun.

You draw out the bestial magic energy within your bonded beast gun to fortify yourself, purge ongoing harm, and bolster your life force with a sheath of swirling life essence. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level and attempt a flat check against any ongoing persistent damage, using the DC appropriate for particularly effective assistance. Using this ability depletes the magic within your bonded beast gun, preventing you from using any of its activated abilities until the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lx8Wt813qavwLISv]{Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gtHTr77BkK4CckEH]{Basic Beast Gunner Spellcasting}

You've learned the deeper secrets of beast guns, making you an expert in the magic they grant you. You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qZzRXAa9mNQPUXoW]{Controlled Bullet} 专长 16

Frequency once per day

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.L1gD3VMD5X9JNJzE]{Beast Gunner Dedication}

You create a direct magical connection with your beast gun, allowing you to guide the beast gun's next shot by taking control of the projectile directly, steering it through the air, and swerving and veering it to continue to hit target after target. Make a beast gun Strike against a creature within the first range increment. On a hit, the shot tears through the target and continues toward another target you can see. You make a Strike against this new target. The new target must be no farther from the previous target than a distance equal to the beast gun's range increment. For example, the new target must be within 150 feet of the previous target when attacking with a drake rifle. On a hit, you can direct the bullet toward a new target.

You can continue to make Strikes against new targets in this same way until your attack misses, at which point your shot dissipates. You can't make a Strike against a target you already attacked during this use of Controlled Bullet, but you can otherwise continue to make attacks against valid targets until you miss. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you've made all your attacks.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6qNRVKwbnX381jVj]{Master Beast Gunner Spellcasting} 专长 18

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lx8Wt813qavwLISv]{Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting}

You've learned the final truth of beast guns, making you a master in the magic they grant you. You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Beastmaster.name: 兽王 Beastmaster
Beastmaster.description:
兽王 Beastmaster

你能激发动物对你的忠诚，随着力量的成长，你能够增加可供使役的动物数量，短暂借用它们的身体感知周遭，甚至能与动物在极远的距离外进行沟通。你的动物可能会将你视为挚爱的父母、师长或指导者，也可能把你认作可怜、无助、需要保护的幼崽。无论如何，它们都会为你而战，陪伴着你，甚至为你献出自己的生命。

补充专长 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.y8VecqdECqyH1h6o]{魔皮 Magic Hide}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.54BhwBHyp2jp3e26]{野性认同 Wild Empathy}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TORYSZMLMAGgsSEW]{伙伴指令 Companion's Cry}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tr2SnOE2WqFIIWIK]{伙伴变巨 Enlarge Companion}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5YcnoTYKvEtkWiHh]{并肩作战(游侠) Side by Side (Ranger)}。由上述专长获取的所有戍卫法术对你来说均为兽王聚能法术。

兽王动物伙伴 BEASTMASTER ANIMAL COMPANIONS

若你要扮演兽王，则可以根据动物伙伴规则来确定动物伙伴的属性和能力。作为兽王，对你来说在同一时间具有多个动物伙伴――至多4个动物伙伴――是可能发生的情况，但其中只有1个动物伙伴，即你的“活跃伙伴”，会在探索期和遭遇中跟随你；其余伙伴都会在附近，通常会在觅食或为了食物狩猎。当你通过兽王变体获得了第二个动物伙伴后，你还会获得呼唤伙伴动作来切换你的活跃伙伴。这些规则适用于你的所有动物伙伴，无论这些动物伙伴是通过兽王变体还是其他来源获得的。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wdmUH6hdat7jpEWt]{兽王入门 Beastmaster Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 自然达到受训熟练度

你会获得1只幼年动物伙伴的服务，它跟随你并遵从你的命令。

与常规的动物伙伴规则不同，本专长会为你提供第2只动物伙伴。当你拥有超过1只动物伙伴时，便会获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.8kGpUUUSX1sB2OqQ]{呼唤伙伴 Call Companion}动作。

某些兽王专长会为你提供原能聚能法术。当你获得第一个兽王聚能法术时，你的原能法术攻击检定以及法术DC的熟练度等级变为受训，此外你使用这些法术的施法关键属性为魅力。提供兽王聚能法术的专长会进行说明，告知它为你的聚能池增加了几点聚能点；若你在此之前不具有聚能池，那么你会获得具有1点聚能点的聚能池作为替代。

你能通过梳毛、喂食、玩耍或其他照顾动物伙伴的行为来进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocus}。

特殊 直至选取另外两个兽王变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

兽王动物伙伴

若你要扮演兽王，则可以根据核心手册的规则来确定动物伙伴的属性和能力。作为兽王，对你来说在同一时间具有多个动物伙伴——至多4个动物伙伴——是可能发生的情况，但其中只有一个动物伙伴，即你的“活跃伙伴”，会在探索期和遭遇中跟随你；其余伙伴都会在附近，通常会在觅食或为了食物狩猎。当你通过兽王变体获得了第二个动物伙伴后，你还会获得呼唤伙伴（Call Companion）动作来切换你的活跃伙伴。这些规则适用于你的所有动物伙伴，无论这些动物伙伴是通过兽王变体还是其他来源获得的。

特殊 直至选取另外两个兽王变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zBLrZE5aCkpaTK2N]{额外伙伴 Additional Companion} 专长 4

先决条件 兽王入门

另一只动物与你一同走上旅途。这是一只具有仆从特征的幼年动物伙伴。关于如何让多个动物伙伴生效，请见兽王入门专长中的兽王动物伙伴。

特殊 你能多次选取该专长，每次选取都会获得一只额外动物伙伴，至多为合计4只动物伙伴，这包含兽王入门专长以及兽王变体之外的其他来源提供的动物伙伴。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OJxEF5FONTtEdbpP]{治疗动物 Heal Animal} 专长 4

先决条件 兽王入门

你能治愈自己的动物伙伴所遭受的创伤。你能将 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Zmh4ynfnCtwKeAYl]{治疗动物 Heal Animal}作为兽王聚能法术来施放。你的聚能池的聚能点数量增加1点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uCElsebJ45ltmZMT]{成年兽王伙伴 Mature Beastmaster Companion} 专长 4

先决条件 兽王入门

你的所有动物伙伴都长大了，变为成年动物伙伴并获得额外能力。在遭遇模式中，即便你没有使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{指挥动物 Command an Animal}动作，你的动物伙伴也能够在你的回合使用一个动作进行打击或行走。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ckglzh4dXcGWPNS3]{兽王神游 Beastmaster's Trance} 专长 6

先决条件 兽王入门

你进入一种出神的状态，这让你能够短暂进入自己的某个动物伙伴体内，同时分享它的感官。你获得聚能法术@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5WM3WjshXgrkVCg6]{兽王神游 Beastmaster Trance}。你的聚能池的聚能点数量增加1点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aEws1NR19Lbu1Kio]{强悍兽王伙伴 Incredible Beastmaster Companion} 专长 8

先决条件 成年兽王伙伴

你的成年动物伙伴进一步成长和进化。它们变为灵敏（nimble）或狂怒（savage）动物伙伴（由你为每个动物伙伴分别选择，包括那些在选取本专长后才变为成年的动物伙伴），根据其类型获得额外能力。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3R09Hl6IDMgPcSs0]{兽王羁绊 Beastmaster Bond} 专长 10

先决条件 兽王入门

你能与位于100尺范围内的自己的动物伙伴通过心灵感应进行沟通。若你的自然熟练度等级达到传奇，则无论自己的动物伙伴位于行星的任何地点，都能与其通过心灵感应进行沟通。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5kUQuIP8N57MXhuz]{兽王之呼唤 Beastmaster's Call} 专长 12

先决条件 兽王入门, 呼唤伙伴

频率 每轮一次

你能快速召唤出一只非活跃伙伴的原能投影，并以此来提供该伙伴的支援收益。投影会抵达距你30尺内由你选择的一个未被占据的方格内，为你提供它的支援收益，之后在你的下个回合消失。投影的AC和豁免检定调整值和真正的动物伙伴一致，如果投影在你的下个回合之前承受任何伤害的话，便会立即消失并停止提供支援收益。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bki36RiEM5FR4aiT]{特化兽王伙伴 Specialized Beastmaster Companion} 专长 8

先决条件 强悍兽王伙伴

你的灵敏（nimble）和狂怒（savage）动物伙伴变得更加狡诈，成为了特化动物伙伴。每个动物伙伴都会根据你的选择获得1项特化（核心手册，要分别进行选择）。

特殊 你能够多次选取该专长。每次选取该专长，都可以将1项不同的特化添加到你的灵敏和狂怒动物伙伴上。你的每只灵敏和狂怒动物伙伴可以具有至多3项特化。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Aeea44xyJqYArFun]{率领兽群 Lead The Pack} 专长 16

先决条件 成年兽王伙伴，你拥有多个动物伙伴

你在同一时间可以具有2只活跃的动物伙伴。然而当你这么做时，@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{命令 Command}它们的难度会提高些许。若你没有对任何动物伙伴下达指令，那么两者之一（由你选择）仍旧可以在你的回合使用一个动作来进行打击或行走，就如同成年兽王伙伴专长所描述的一般，但仅限其中之一如此行动。

当你指挥动物时，选择其中一个动物伙伴来如常获得两个动作，或者选择让两个动物伙伴都获得一个动作来进行打击或行走。无论何种方式，直至你的下个回合为止，均无法再次使用指挥动物来让任何动物伙伴再次行动。

Bellflower Tiller.name: Bellflower Tiller
Bellflower Tiller.description:
Bellflower Tiller

Bellflower tillers handle most of the ground-level efforts of freeing slaves and escorting them to safety. They use farming-related code words to hide their work: a tiller's freed slaves are her "crop," which she moves along secretive paths termed "rows," taking shelter in secret hideouts referred to as "barns."

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dwL0Y0P2x4pn2cft]{Bellflower Dedication} 专长 6

先决条件 魅力14, expert in Stealth and Survival, member of the Bellflower Network

You dedicate yourself to freeing slaves and escorting them to freedom. You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. Choose up to six other people to be your "crop." Members of your crop can use your Speed for overland travel if it's higher than their own. Members more than 60 feet from you lose all benefits (from this or other Bellflower tiller feats) of being part of your crop, but they regain those benefits immediately when they return. You can add or remove someone from your crop by spending 10 minutes in conversation with them.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Bellflower tiller变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bXoGskH0SYfdcEtJ]{Garden Path} 专长 8

先决条件 Bellflower Dedication

You can guide your crop to move without notice. When you and any of your crop are Avoiding Notice, you can choose one member of your crop to temporarily gain the benefits of the Quiet Allies skill feat until the group is no longer Avoiding Notice. The group rolls two checks instead of one, using the higher die roll. This is a fortune effect.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0Bu48kn3Deq9gHQE]{Practiced Guidance} 专长 8

先决条件 Bellflower Dedication

Making one's way to safety can be harrowing, but you have extensive practice at helping others along that path. When you roll a success to Aid a member of your crop, you get a critical success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RivbJYEBUyfLwPh7]{Scarecrow} 专长 8

先决条件 Bellflower Dedication

You fight fiercely to protect your crop. When you hit a creature that is adjacent to two or more members of your crop with a weapon or unarmed attack, you gain a circumstance bonus to your damage roll equal to the number of weapon damage dice. When you hit a creature who has a member of your crop grabbed, that member can attempt to Escape using a reaction.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6Hv4kpHj8IexNUey]{Tiller's Aid} 专长 10

先决条件 Bellflower Dedication

You can use the Aid reaction to help a member of your crop even if you haven't prepared to do so.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive} 专长 10

先决条件 Bellflower Dedication

Your Speed bonus from Bellflower Dedication increases to +10 feet. Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r0twuF5nxXN5lkLk]{Cut the Bonds} 专长 12

先决条件 Bellflower Dedication, expert in a melee weapon

Select a magical effect that has made an adjacent member of your crop clumsy, grabbed, paralyzed, restrained, or slowed. Attempt a counteract check using your attack modifier (including your multiple attack penalty) with a melee weapon with which you have expert proficiency. Your counteract level is half your level rounded up. On a success, you free that member from the effect; on a failure, you can't attempt to use Cut the Bonds on that effect on that crop member until 24 hours have passed.

Blessed One.name: 获选者 Blessed One
Blessed One.description:
获选者 Blessed One

通过幸运或壮举、遗传或英雄行为，你得到了神祇的祝福。这种祝福的表现是治疗创伤、移除有害状态的能力，且不依赖于你所信奉的神明。你可能会因为拥有此等力量而日夜赞颂神祗，也可以不情愿地背上这些祝福，寻求逃避责任的方法，神祗公然挑战神对你施加的这些影响。也许你会穿上对应教派的祭袍，当然你也可能不怎么在意甚至缺乏对力量之源的敬畏。然而无论你如何看待这些馈赠，这毫无疑问地让你把特别的力量窝在了手中。善良阵营的神祗最有可能将力量赐予获选者。不过只要神祗能赋予自己的牧师使用正能量神力源泉，任何阵营的神祗都可以赐予这样的祝福。这意味着拉马什图这样的神祗可能会为获选者提供邪恶版本的力量。

补充专长 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aiHbS8FGNYAQBF62]{加速之触 Accelerating Touch}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{救济 Mercy}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fx50Ivl1ERxTijpT]{精力救济 Invigorating Mercy}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kZdcoaTD849QalR9]{高等救济 Greater Mercy}; 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.647GZOyhWgcjw6Jg]{澄清救济 Elucidating Mercy}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tCuMXQ0yMrCNwzqW]{适性之触 Resilient Touch}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nsFnOLqYSkGWFhLD]{苦难救济 Affliction Mercy}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Cy5W8U4yN9P1EvBy]{扬善之触 Amplifying Touch}; 20级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xZrTjUub7V09sXZF]{复原之触 Rejuvenating Touch}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eBdajOzs8kiJDic2]{获选者入门 Blessed One Dedication} 专长 2

你被神祇碰触并被赋予了能够减轻他人痛苦的能力。

你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{圣疗 Lay on Hands} 虔诚法术。施放这样的聚能法术会消耗1聚能点。此专长赋予了你具有1聚能点的聚能池，由此你可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocus}行动恢复聚能池。

你能通过冥想来进行再聚能，这与你本人是否笃信赐予你祝福的神祇无关，你的祝福都会填充聚能池。

你从获选者变体获得的虔诚法术是神术法术。

特殊 直至选取另外两个获选者变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NrCloSukzSUCprsM]{获选者的献身 Blessed Sacrifice} 专长 4

先决条件 获选者入门

你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rQYob0QMJ0I1U2sU]{献身守护 Protector's Sacrifice}领域法术作为你的虔诚法术。你的聚能池的聚能点数量增加1点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.V3nNlrdU2OxYJAjx]{获选者法术 Blessed Spell} 专长 8

先决条件 获选者入门, 能够使用法术位施放法术，救济

频率 每10分一次

当你将法术聚焦于盟友时，能够移除有害状态。

若你的下个动作是使用法术位来@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell}，而且该法术仅以单个盟友为目标，那么你还能够尝试移除该盟友身上的一个有害状态。该状态必须是你的救济（Mercy）专长能够移除的有害状态之一，这也包括@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kZdcoaTD849QalR9]{高等救济 Greater Mercy}这样的后续专长所提供的可选状态。

基于法术的DC和环级尝试一次反制检定。该效果是在你施放的法术产生的正常效果外额外添加的。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kKoqqXOTdRYROmVV]{获选者之拒 Blessed Denial} 专长 12

先决条件 获选者入门

触发 30尺范围内的一个盟友将要陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}。

你散发出平和与保护的气息，削弱降临到盟友头上的有害状态。你的盟友将要承受的状态数值降低1点（最低降至0点）。若该盟友同时承受的状态超过1项，则从中选择一个你要降低的状态。

Bounty Hunter.name: 赏金猎人 Bounty Hunter
Bounty Hunter.description:
赏金猎人 Bounty Hunter

无论是为了金钱、荣誉还是正义投入这个行业，所有赏金猎人都懂得如何追踪、击败并俘获危险个体。你已经习惯了仔细阅读通缉令、寻找线索并把恶徒缉拿归案的生活了。

补充专长 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pbD4lfAPkK1NNag0]{双重猎杀 Double Prey}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tKaesXO5nlZ2sspx]{赏金猎人入门 Bounty Hunter Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 生存达到受训熟练度

当你专注于搜寻猎物时，只能用冷酷无情来形容。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}动作。你只能使用猎杀目标指定曾经见过或听说过的生物，或者以其他方式了解过的生物也可以，比如通过悬赏告示板或者通缉令。除了猎杀目标所带来的的正常效果之外，你会在与你猎物相关的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{搜集信息 Gather Information}检定中获得+2环境加值。

若你已经具有猎杀目标，那么除了在与你猎物相关的搜集信息中获得环境加值外，生存技能的熟练度等级还会变为专家；除了上述情况之外，你还可以在探索模式期间指定你在追踪的生物为目标。

特殊 直至选取另外两个赏金猎人变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mRHkGMLecd5aaj2R]{谋生的家伙 Tools Of The Trade} 专长 4

你很熟悉那些能活捉“赏金”的武器。你在后述武器的熟练度上变为受训：@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.YUzPv0i8d8p2J9yx]{绳球 Bola}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TLQErnOpM9Luy7rL]{闷棍 Sap}和 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{鞭子 Whip}。你变得可以使用绳球（bola）。每当你通过职业特性获得上述一种或多种武器的熟练度，使其熟练度上升至专家或更高时，上述所有武器的熟练度都会获得提升。

此外，当你使用不具有非致命特性的武器进行非致命攻击时，不会因此而承受减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N0YcU8mIJnQ4C2N6]{搜捕队 Posse} 专长 4

需求 你已经用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}指定了猎物

通过花费1分钟时间来指导他人协助你捕猎你的猎物，你可以指导至多5名自愿生物协助你。他们会在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} 你的猎物、@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Track}你的猎物以及与你的猎物相关的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{搜集信息 Gather Information}检定中获得+1环境加值。在进入与你的猎物的战斗时，你和协助你的生物均会在先攻检定中获得+1环境加值。

上述好处持续至你指定一名新的猎物或者当前指定的猎物死亡为止，以较先发生者为准。当某个协助你的生物离开你太久，以至于无法从你的指示中获益时，他便会失去上述好处。这个时间通常为1小时，但最终决定权在GM手中。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OzvvsyjAWWij4mmm]{跟进 Keep Pace} 专长 6

触发 你的猎物（prey）在触及范围内，并且尝试远离你

你的猎物无法逃出你的掌心。至多以你的速度进行行走跟上敌人，并在他移动的过程中自始至终都将其维持在你的触及之内，直至他停下或你已经以完整的速度进行移动为止。

若你具有相应的移动类型，便可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{掘地 Burrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{飞行 Fly}或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{游泳 Swim}来取代行走进行跟进（Keep Pace）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BVHDkBa4JMmmj5Sn]{借机擒抱 Opportunistic Grapple} 专长 8

需求 你的猎物（prey）在触及范围内，你至少空着一只手，且目标体型最多比你大1级

触发 你的猎物（prey）在一次对你进行的近战@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strike} 攻击检定中掷出大失败

你尝试一次运动检定对你的猎物进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grapple}。

Bright Lion.name: Bright Lion
Bright Lion.description:
Bright Lion

You are one of the Bright Lions, part revolutionary warrior, part undercover spy.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rJ1XxUEACaQA9Lyo]{Bright Lion Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 member of the Bright Lions, not a worshipper of Walkena, trained in Stealth

获取许可 @Compendium[pf2e.backgrounds.JfGVkZkaoz2lnmov]{Bright Lion} background

You become trained in your choice of Deception or Diplomacy and in Mzali Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You incorporate enough worship of Walkena in your daily life to avoid suspicion. You typically don't need to Lie or Impersonate to pass yourself off as a worshipper of Walkena. Against careful inspection, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks specifically to pass yourself off as a version of yourself faithful to Walkena.

特殊 直至选取另外两个Bright Lion变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.J1MURfqf0kbxrKG9]{Warding Light} 专长 4

先决条件 Bright Lion Dedication

You gain a tattoo that serves as a special ward to defend you against Walkena's forces.

The tattoo allows you to cast the light cantrip as a divine innate spell at will. The cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. If you die, the tattoo immediately casts gentle repose on your corpse, heightened to the same spell level.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vqLt1qjdrflTmdsw]{Sun's Fury} 专长 6

先决条件 Bright Lion Dedication

The Old Sun Gods have granted you a gift in your fight against Walkena. You gain the sun's fury focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to pray to the Old Sun Gods; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. Your Bright Lion focus spells are divine spells; when you gain this feat, if you aren't already, you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability score.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vVyX9IG8flxg81mc]{Elude the Divine} 专长 8

先决条件 Bright Lion Dedication

You are able to escape inquisitions involving divine magic, allowing you to blend in well in Mzali but also to avoid unwanted attention in other oppressive theocracies. You gain the Slippery Secrets skill feat, and its benefits also apply against divination effects that attempt to discern your deity. When using Slippery Secrets against a divine divination, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and on a critical success, the divination reveals false information appropriate to your false persona, rather than nothing.

Bullet Dancer.name: Bullet Dancer
Bullet Dancer.description:
Bullet Dancer

While most monastic orders and traditional fighting schools shun firearms as loud and unreliable technology for unskilled conscripts, you fuse flourishing feints and ricocheting gunplay into a whirling ballet of bullets. As a bullet dancer, you might become the target of brash duelists and gladiators looking to make a name for themselves. But you tend to welcome the attention and might have proven your reputation while dancing your deadly ballet in tournaments from Tymon to Goka. You've found your fluid motions and explosive attacks to be surefire crowd-pleasers, even as they serve to confound and shock your foes.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.j1hhTLOq7o80XCyV]{Bullet Dancer Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 expert in unarmored defense and trained in unarmed attack

You've learned how to synchronize traditional martial arts and guns. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance} action. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you gain that new proficiency with bayonets, reinforced stocks, simple firearms and unarmed attacks.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VeVHWTrzE3aDm3rx]{Brawling Focus} 专长 4*

* This version of the Brawling Focus feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VeVHWTrzE3aDm3rx]{original feat}.

You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand. You gain access to the critical specialization effects of unarmed strikes in the brawling group and weapons in the brawling group. If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YW4FdWgzTwRFneFF]{Monastic Weaponry}, you also gain the critical specialization effects of all monk weapons in which you are trained.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.A2EBy2L4acrehiAA]{Pistol Twirl} 专长 4*

* This version of the Pistol Twirl feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.A2EBy2L4acrehiAA]{original feat}.

Your quick gestures and flair for performance distract your opponent, leaving it vulnerable to your follow-up attacks. You Feint against an opponent within the required weapon's first range increment, rather than an opponent within melee reach. If you succeed, the foe is flat-footed against your melee and ranged attacks, rather than only your melee attacks. On a critical failure, you're flat-footed against the target's melee and ranged attacks, rather than only its melee attacks.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vPZxFpq7XkRmE3Uc]{Black Powder Boost} 专长 6*

需求 You're wielding a loaded firearm.

* This version of the Black Powder Boost feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vPZxFpq7XkRmE3Uc]{original feat}.

You fire your weapon as you jump, using the kickback to go farther. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and discharge your firearm to add a +10-foot status bonus to the distance traveled. If you spend 2 actions for Black Powder Boost, you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} instead.

特殊 An ability that allows you to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} as a single action (like the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Quick Jump} skill feat) lets you use Black Powder Boost as a single action for those jumps as well.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uc6JcNrI31wzSC2h]{Bullet Dancer Burn} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.j1hhTLOq7o80XCyV]{Bullet Dancer Dedication}

The fiery blaze of your weapons combined with your unorthodox technique leaves your opponents with little opportunity to capitalize on any gaps in your defenses, or properly defend themselves against your onslaught. While in @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}, when you successfully Strike an opponent with a bayonet or reinforced stock attached to your firearm, the next ranged Strike you make against that opponent doesn't trigger reactions that would trigger on a ranged attack, such as Attack of Opportunity. While in Bullet Dancer Stance, when you make a successful ranged Strike against an opponent within your melee reach using a firearm, the next reinforced stock or bayonet attack attached to that firearm deals an additional 1 fire damage per weapon damage die.

The benefit on your next Strike from either use of Bullet Dancer Burn is lost if not used by the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YrRlbIzjsFlGGmVN]{Black Powder Blaze} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vPZxFpq7XkRmE3Uc]{Black Powder Boost}

需求 You're wielding a loaded firearm.

You learn to take advantage of every shot, flying across the battlefield with the help of your weapon's recoil. Stride and use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vPZxFpq7XkRmE3Uc]{Black Powder Boost}. Make a ranged Strike with the required weapon at any point during the Black Powder Boost.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0UdHPOv3DX8TY9yb]{Snap Shot} 专长 8*

* This version of the Snap Shot feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0UdHPOv3DX8TY9yb]{original feat}.

You've learned to react with ranged weapons when a creature is in close quarters. You can use a reaction that normally allows you to make a melee weapon Strike to instead make a ranged weapon Strike. You must be Striking an adjacent target. If necessary for the reaction's trigger, you treat your ranged weapon as if it had a reach of 5 feet. If the reaction has other requirements, such as wielding a specific kind of weapon, Snap Shot doesn't allow you to ignore them; it allows you only to replace a melee weapon Strike with a ranged weapon Strike.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5ZX4btrw5yjBr8IM]{Bullet Dancer Reload} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uc6JcNrI31wzSC2h]{Bullet Dancer Burn}

需求 You're in @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}.

You've learned to reload your simple firearms with uncanny grace, the ammunition simply falling into place as though part of a well-practiced kata. You Strike with a simple firearm, and then Interact to reload that same firearm. You don't need a free hand to reload your simple firearm in this way.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ySr510TkpUO3N6Ty]{Trick Shot} 专长 12*

需求 You're wielding a loaded crossbow or firearm.

* This version of the Trick Shot feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ySr510TkpUO3N6Ty]{original feat}.

You shoot not at your foe but at an object nearby. Make a Strike with your firearm against an AC equal to an easy DC for your level. On a success, instead of hitting your foe, your attack hits an object behind or to the side of your target, creating one of the following effects. The GM might determine that a different AC is appropriate or that a particular effect isn't a valid option, such as using the explosive barrel option when there's no such object on the battlefield. The GM should inform you if a Trick Shot is feasible before you spend your actions, since your trained eye can easily recognize loose or volatile objects.

  • Dislodge Object Your attack knocks an unattended object of no more than 2 Bulk out of position, moving it up to 10 feet in a direction of your choice. For example, the weapon could knock a wizard's crystal ball off a table.
  • Explosive Barrel Your attack strikes a barrel of expensive rum, a vial of volatile alchemical fluids, a demonic pustule erupting from the earth, or some other explosive object. The object explodes in a 20-foot burst, and creatures in the area take 6d6 damage with a basic Reflex save against your class DC. The damage type is chosen by the GM, based on the exploding object. Increase the damage by 1d6 for every 2 levels you have above 10th.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MyDluIbnX2sjm3pB]{Ranged Disarm} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.j1hhTLOq7o80XCyV]{Bullet Dancer Dedication}; @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ySr510TkpUO3N6Ty]{Trick Shot}

需求 You're wielding a simple firearm.

When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands. Attempt to Disarm the target using a ranged attack roll with your simple firearm, instead of attempting an Athletics check against the target's Reflex DC.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.c7mCj6wUdb47rrnw]{Ricochet Shot} 专长 14*

* This version of the Ricochet Shot feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.c7mCj6wUdb47rrnw]{original feat}.

You bounce your shot off a nearby surface to strike your opponent from an unexpected angle. When determining whether a target has cover from your ranged attack with a firearm or crossbow, you can choose one solid surface within your weapon's first range increment to ricochet your shot off of. If you do, you determine the target's cover from the point where you ricochet your shot instead of from you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UZpBsHE57rmS0x6S]{Showstopper} 专长 16*

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.A2EBy2L4acrehiAA]{Pistol Twirl}; master in Deception

* This version of the Showstopper feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UZpBsHE57rmS0x6S]{original feat}.

Your twirling weapons create a grand distraction that's difficult to look away from. When using Pistol Twirl to Feint, you can target all enemies within your weapon's first range increment who you can perceive and who can see you. You roll one Deception check and compare it against each target's Perception DC.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VW0Tp5rJDRjaJuSn]{Two-Weapon Fusillade} 专长 16*

需求 You're wielding two weapons, each in a different hand. At least one of these weapons must be a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow.

* This version of the Two-Weapon Fusillade feat is intended for use with an Archetype and has a different level for access than the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VW0Tp5rJDRjaJuSn]{original feat}.

You attack with both your weapons in a furious barrage. Strike twice, once with each weapon.

Butterfly Blade.name: Butterfly Blade
Butterfly Blade.description:
Butterfly Blade

You've trained in one of Goka's oldest traditions of espionage, intimidation, and combat mastery. You use your skills to learn about your enemies and cut them down with your mastery of the butterfly sword.

补充专长 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.D1o7GUraoFFzjaub]{Clever Gambit}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5FyvwI24mnROzh61]{Combat Assessment}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qFt6zyWVX1njJf1l]{Quick Draw}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9SYnbjFgyucjhN5e]{Dread Striker}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.txo0xFYUfAjdmyjt]{Butterfly Blade Dedication} 专长 4

先决条件 trained in @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JuR0cug2xq4sWxHR]{Butterfly Swords}

获取许可 Defeat a member of the Butterfly Blades in a sanctioned bout.

You become trained in Deception and Stealth; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with butterfly swords. You gain access to butterfly swords.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from this变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zMT3etCcdPdtAdOn]{Butterfly's Kiss} 专长 6

先决条件 Butterfly Blade Dedication

You can make nonlethal Strikes with a butterfly sword without taking a penalty.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.i5LtFOpsUR5S74pC]{Butterfly's Sting} 专长 6

先决条件 Butterfly Blades Dedication

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.j1JE61quDxdge4mg]{Sneak Attack} class feature. You don't increase the number of dice as you gain levels.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nuBY8Ek4JBFQJzoh]{Mastermind's Eye} 专长 6

先决条件 Butterfly Blade Dedication

When you succeed at identifying a creature using Recall Knowledge, that creature is flat-footed against your attacks until the start of your next turn; if you critically succeed, it's flat-footed against your attacks for 1 minute. This feat serves as the rogue's @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RyOkmu0W9svavuAB]{Mastermind Racket} for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Yy9LXo2GaLT7eCOL]{Deadly Butterfly} 专长 8

先决条件 Butterfly Blade Dedication

You gain access to the butterfly sword's critical specialization effect. If you already had access to the critical specialization effect or you gain the effect at a later time, you also gain the critical specialization effect for knives when you critically hit with a butterfly sword. You can benefit from only one critical specialization effect at a time.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aOYnK0xe9DKFtx7d]{Innocent Butterfly} 专长 10

先决条件 Butterfly Blade Dedication

You know how to alter the perceptions of others. You can cast aura of the unremarkable once per day as an innate arcane spell. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Captivator.name: Captivator
Captivator.description:
Captivator

Others find you inherently fascinating. You have a facility with words that draws others in, and you've always found it easy to sway others to your point of view. This ability has grown to the point where you're capable of innate magic. You can bend others' wills to your own by weaving alluring enchantments and compelling illusions. Perhaps this comes from a touch of fey or draconic blood in your family's distant past, or perhaps it's the work of some special boon or curse placed upon you.

Captivators come from all areas of the world and all walks of life. A farmhand with the right gifts, sent to the market every week to hawk their latest crop, could find themself on the path to becoming a captivator. An urchin who relies on the sympathy of others just to survive may become a captivator out of necessity, and a noble, immersed in a deadly game of luxury and influence, might have trained to be a captivator since birth. Regardless of background, most captivators use their abilities to advance their station in life, make things easier for themselves, or befriend those who can help them achieve their goals.

Good captivators use their gifts and skills to bring people together. They might turn a would-be tavern brawl into a night of sharing drinks and telling stories. They might offer encouragement to those facing depression or doubt. They excel at ending conflict peacefully and efficiently, leaving everyone around them happier. When faced with violence, they use their magic to quickly subdue or enthrall enemies while minimizing harm to their companions.

Evil captivators manipulate others to achieve status, wealth, and power. They have no qualms about deceiving someone or using their magic to cause harm. Evil captivators are dangerous tricksters whose enchantments and illusions make them seem harmless, unimportant, or friendly. The slick politician, the devious con artist, the cunning courtier—these are all roles that an evil captivator can easily assume.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IrxtH1BFlUOS0DnQ]{Captivator Dedication} 专长 4

先决条件 魅力14, trained in Deception or Diplomacy

Your ability to captivate others borders on the preternatural. You are seldom at a loss in social situations, and you can create minor enchantments or illusions. Choose Deception or Diplomacy. You become trained in that skill, or become an expert if you were already trained.

Choose two cantrips from the occult list; each cantrip must be from either the enchantment or illusion school. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity and can cast these spells as occult innate spells. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs. If you have a hand free, you can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need to use a spell component pouch. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

特殊 直至选取另外两个captivator变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kmIgbWLbaarqmMaY]{Basic Captivator Spellcasting} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IrxtH1BFlUOS0DnQ]{Captivator Dedication}

Your innate ability to fascinate others develops into full-fledged spellcasting. This spellcasting comes naturally and instinctively to you, rather than as a product of training. Choose a 1st-level occult spell from either the enchantment or illusion school. You can Cast this Spell as an occult innate spell. At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level spell. Each of these spells must be from either the enchantment or illusion school.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K9SpdinLWc7YRVHP]{Captivating Intensity} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kmIgbWLbaarqmMaY]{Basic Captivator Spellcasting}

Your innate ability to fascinate others develops into full-fledged spellcasting. This spellcasting comes naturally and instinctively to you, rather than as a product of training. Choose a 1st-level occult spell from either the enchantment or illusion school. You can Cast this Spell as an occult innate spell. At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level spell. Each of these spells must be from either the enchantment or illusion school.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r7srDh7Iz94vfwwN]{Countercharm} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kmIgbWLbaarqmMaY]{Basic Captivator Spellcasting}

触发 A creature Casts a Spell from the enchantment or illusion school.

需求 You have an innate non-cantrip captivator spell of the same school.

Your enchantments and illusions are so dominant that you can use them to counteract similar magic cast by others. When a foe casts an enchantment or illusion spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own innate magic to disrupt it. You lose an innate, non-cantrip spell of the same school as the triggering spell as if you had Cast the Spell. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell with your spell.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BBvmmULFPLlHCeIK]{Heightened Captivation} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IrxtH1BFlUOS0DnQ]{Captivator Dedication}

You can infuse your enchantments and illusions with more power. Choose one of your spells granted by captivator archetype feats; this spell can't be from your highest level of non-cantrip captivator spells. The spell you choose is heightened to the highest level of captivator spell you can cast, not including cantrips. You can't later change the spell that is heightened by this feat.

特殊 You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you choose a different spell.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QhKLXGJPLZaX1qDp]{Expert Captivator Spellcasting} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kmIgbWLbaarqmMaY]{Basic Captivator Spellcasting}

You learn more powerful spells to enchant and deceive. You learn a 4th-level occult spell. At 12th level, you learn a 5th-level spell, and at 14th level, you learn a 6th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from either the enchantment or illusion school. You Cast these Spells as occult innate spells. You become an expert with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cQ2jy4Utoxmk3MkG]{Reactive Charm} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IrxtH1BFlUOS0DnQ]{Captivator Dedication}

Frequency once per day

需求 You are the target of a spell or attack.

You're so charming and distracting that when pressed, you can cast a simple enchantment in time to foil an attacker. You cast any of your 1st-level enchantment spells that normally take two actions or fewer to cast. This takes effect before the triggering spell or attack, and if the attacker is affected by your spell, it can make different decisions based on the effects (for instance, if you charm the attacker and it becomes friendly to you, it can choose a different target than you for its attack or spell). The attacking creature must be in range of your chosen spell, and if your spell requires targets, the attacking creature must be a valid target. Your spell affects only the attacking creature, even if it would normally affect more targets or an area.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lZA7SYBmSPFlKNr2]{Efortless Captivation} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IrxtH1BFlUOS0DnQ]{Captivator Dedication}

触发 Your turn begins.

You maintain your innate enchantments and illusions with hardly a thought. You immediately gain the effects of the Sustain a Spell action, which you can use only to extend the duration of an enchantment or illusion spell.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jI4Eoi6m0ogjXkGK]{Master Captivator Spellcasting} 专长 16

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QhKLXGJPLZaX1qDp]{Expert Captivator Spellcasting}

You master the most powerful spells that enchant and deceive. You learn a 7th-level occult spell. At 18th level, you learn an 8th-level spell, and at 20th level, you learn a 9th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from either the enchantment or illusion school. You cast these spells as occult innate spells. You become a master with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blOiU4LPlBjVHcgR]{Look Again} 专长 18

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IrxtH1BFlUOS0DnQ]{Captivator Dedication}

Frequency once per day

If your illusions or enchantments fail to ensnare the minds of others, you can cast them again. If your next action is to cast an innate enchantment or illusion spell and it fails to affect any targets, you do not lose the spell. You must use the same number of actions to recast the same spell on your following turn; if you can't, or choose not to, you waste that number of actions with no effect. After this second casting, you lose the spell whether it affected any targets or not. Look Again works only with spells that require targets and doesn't do anything if you cast a targeted spell but didn't select any targets.

Cathartic Mage.name: Cathartic Mage
Cathartic Mage.description:
Cathartic Mage

Rarity Uncommon

Emotions are powerful, and you can tap into that power to enhance your magic for a time. You learn to harness a particular emotional state under the right conditions, but be warned: emotions are volatile and destructive if left unchecked. The experience often leaves you reeling from the unhindered emotion, requiring a rest or distraction before tapping into it again.

Emotional Focus

Some emotional states, such as love or hatred, require the caster to focus on a specific individual called their emotional focus. Your emotional focus can change over time with you choosing a new focus after an important part of your story is resolved. Work with your GM to determine when this change happens. An emotional focus doesn't get a say in the matter; the cathartic spellcaster's emotions determine the bond. However, making another PC your emotional focus could result in an uncomfortable social dynamic. You should check with that PC's player in advance to see if such a link is acceptable.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dkuY22d3yLUBcqhq]{Cathartic Mage Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 魅力14 or ability to cast spells from spell slotes

You've learned to harness a particular emotion and mix it into your magic. Choose an emotion from the Emotional States section to be your catharsis emotion.

If you don't already cast spells from spell slots, you learn to cast spontaneous spells and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with one cantrip of your choice, from a spell list of your choice. You choose this cantrip from the common spells on your chosen spell list or from other spells to which you have access on that list. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for that tradition. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

If you can already cast spells from spell slots, you learn one additional cantrip from your spellcasting tradition. If you're a prepared caster, you can prepare this spell in addition to your usual cantrips per day; if you're a spontaneous caster, you add this cantrip to your spell repertoire.

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2424g94rpoiN1IPh]{Catharsis} reaction and the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EhLvRWFKhZ3HtrZO]{Settle Emotions} activity.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the cathartic mage变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fVP8jX7yRUpyrcVO]{Basic Cathartic Spellcasting} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dkuY22d3yLUBcqhq]{Cathartic Mage Dedication}

You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of that spell level from your chosen tradition to your repertoire-either a common spell or another spell you've learned or discovered.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yqMBLt0GUTwiqnZT]{Cathartic Focus Spell} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dkuY22d3yLUBcqhq]{Cathartic Mage Dedication}

You learn the focus spell listed under your emotion's entry. You can cast it only while in emotional fervor. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus while you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EhLvRWFKhZ3HtrZO]{Settle Emotions}.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kQfqJLpKOPORq7I6]{Work Yourself Up} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dkuY22d3yLUBcqhq]{Cathartic Mage Dedication}

需求 You have a reaction available and aren't prevented from using @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2424g94rpoiN1IPh]{Catharsis}.

You concentrate on your mental state, tapping into that raw emotional energy. Take your Catharsis reaction, causing the catharsis activation and entering your emotional fervor as normal. The fervor lasts only until the end of your turn. At the end of your emotional fervor, you experience the effects of your emotional fallout, as normal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IZFw3Do0kBdgwZX0]{Expert Cathartic Spellcasting} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fVP8jX7yRUpyrcVO]{Basic Cathartic Spellcasting}

You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zybYSfeM0PLPpAaa]{Infectious Emotions} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dkuY22d3yLUBcqhq]{Cathartic Mage Dedication}

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2424g94rpoiN1IPh]{Catharsis}, one ally within 30 feet gains the catharsis activation benefits in addition to you. If these benefits require an emotional focus, they use your emotional focus as they're experiencing an empathic imprint of your emotions. Depending on the activation benefit, it might be impossible to grant it to an ally; for instance, pride could only have an effect for an ally if both you and the ally critically failed the same saving throw against the same effect.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5NWZct5OvSiVvMn8]{Master Cathartic Spellcasting} 专长 18

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IZFw3Do0kBdgwZX0]{Expert Cathartic Spellcasting}

You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Cavalier.name: 骑兵 Cavalier
Cavalier.description:
骑兵 Cavalier

你是一名技巧娴熟的职业战士，强大的动物同伴是你的坐骑，你驾驭着它熟练地驰骋于战场之上。你与坐骑是一对最佳拍档，怀着共同的决心化身为战场中的致命武力。你可能会挥舞着以某个大组织、一名君主或你所追寻的理想为名的旗帜，当然你也可能仅仅为了自身的威名、声誉和金钱而战。

骑兵誓言 CAVALIER PLEDGES

许多骑兵会立下誓言，服务于某个特定组织或个人，比如贵族家庭、君主、骑士团或其他组织，也可以是一种纯粹的理念。对某个守则或理想立下誓言的骑兵必须遵循其规章，而且也要避免犯下相应的禁忌；举例说明，对德鲁伊的动物派系立下誓言的骑兵要遵守相应的禁忌，而对阿巴达尔的教会立下誓言的骑兵，应当与侍奉该神祇的牧师具有相同的标准。若你对某个实体或事业立下誓言，但对其禁忌没有相关说明的话，你应当与GM一同合作，确立一套与你的誓言相关的准则和禁忌。立下誓言的骑兵会获得与誓言相关的特定能力的使用权，比如骑兵旗帜。若你违反了与自身誓言相关的禁忌，那么你会失去所有相应专长的使用权，直至从赎罪仪式中获益为止。改变誓言的对象相当于重训一个职业特性。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5Q69PI8jdQVkb1ZT]{骑兵入门 Cavalier Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 自然或社群达到受训熟练度

你获得一个幼年动物伙伴作为你的坐骑。你可以从所有具有坐骑特殊能力的动物伙伴中选择，也可以通过你的誓言（pledge）获得额外选项，不过这需要由你的GM判断。你所选择的动物伙伴的体型必须至少比你大1级，但如果该动物的常规起始数据为小型，那么你可以在一开始选择该动物的中型版本（除了体型之外其他数据不作任何改变）。

特殊 直至选取另外两个骑兵变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。若你所立下誓言的组织和其他入门专长相关，则不用遵循上述限制。举例说明：若你对地狱骑士团立下誓言，则不需要优先选取其他骑兵变体专长，而直接选取地狱骑士入门专长（Hellknight dedication feats）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{骑兵旗帜 Cavalier's Banner} 专长 4

先决条件 骑兵入门

需求 你已经立下誓言为某个特定组织或理想而服务（详细见：骑兵誓言）

你在坐骑上扬起曾经宣誓的旗帜，鼓舞盟友的士气。你和所有30尺范围内的盟友在对抗恐惧（fear）效果的意志豁免和DC上获得+1环境加值。若你的旗帜被破坏或移除（removed），所有30尺内的盟友会陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Vab3XIirjs3KQh3t]{骑兵冲锋 Cavalier's Charge} 专长 4

先决条件 骑兵入门

需求 你正骑乘在你的坐骑上

你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{指挥动物 Command an Animal}来让坐骑行走2次。在此移动之中的任意一点，你能对触及范围或第一个射程增量（若你使用的是远程武器）内的一名敌人进行进行一次打击。你在攻击检定中获得+1环境加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Nxke8WzifQafSa4I]{威风坐骑 Impressive Mount} 专长 4

先决条件 骑兵入门

你把坐骑训练成战场上的一股强大力量。你通过骑兵入门（Cavalier Dedication）专长获得的坐骑变为成年动物伙伴，获得额外能力。在遭遇模式中，即便你没有使用指挥动物动作，你的动物伙伴仍能够在你的回合使用一个动作进行打击或行走。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.G9l2g7sDpPVbZJza]{快速骑乘 Quick Mount} 专长 4

先决条件 骑兵入门, 自然达到专家熟练度

需求 你与一个体型至少比你大1级，且自愿成为你的坐骑的生物相邻

你和你的坐骑能够随时进入备战状态。你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{骑乘 Mount}该生物并@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{指挥动物 Command an Animal}对其下达一个你所选择的命令。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sflJhnFzYfqZ2tDy]{保护坐骑 Defend Mount} 专长 6

先决条件 骑兵入门

触发 当你正在骑乘坐骑时，一个敌人对你的坐骑作出了一次攻击检定

你把自己置于攻击者和坐骑之间，保护坐骑免受伤害。

使用你自己的AC对抗触发反应的攻击，以取代使用你的坐骑的AC。若触发反应的攻击命中，你会取代坐骑承受攻击产生的所有效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oGOxrqT7DHI43SVk]{持盾骑兵 Mounted Shield} 专长 6

先决条件 骑兵入门

你已经受过训练，可以用盾牌同时保护自己和坐骑。当你在骑乘时 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{举起盾牌 Raise a Shield}），你和你的坐骑都会获得盾牌为AC提供的环境加值。

若你具有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block}反应动作，那么只要你正骑乘在坐骑上，就可以用该动作来为坐骑承受伤害。若你这么做，盾牌会替你的坐骑承受伤害，以取代替你承受伤害，并在其他方面如常遵循盾牌格挡的规则。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AYBfwGImT28lUdue]{威武坐骑 Incredible Mount} 专长 8

先决条件 威风坐骑

在你的训练和照料下，坐骑的内在潜能被激发出来。你通过骑兵入门（Cavalier Dedication）专长获得的坐骑变为灵敏（nimble）或狂怒（savage）动物伙伴（由你选择），根据动物伙伴的类型获得额外能力。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t6sey3cyV8n7a78l]{践踏冲锋 Trampling Charge} 专长 10

先决条件 骑兵入门

需求 你正在骑乘的坐骑具有使用腿部进行的（如爪、蹄等等）近战打击

你驱策坐骑向前冲锋，践踏路径上的敌人。你命令坐骑进行行走，距离至多与其速度（若具有相应移动类型的话，也可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{掘地 Burrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{飞行 Fly}或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{游泳 Swim}）相同，移动穿过任何在路径上且体型至少比你的坐骑小1级的敌人。

你的坐骑会对路径上穿过空间内的每个生物造成伤害，数值与坐骑的腿部进行的近战打击相同，所有目标都要进行一次基础反射豁免对抗你坐骑的运动DC。若掷出大失败，对应生物还会在直至你的下个回合结束为止陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。在此次移动中，你只能对每个生物造成单次伤害。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.39RJF47FLYr5gZ8p]{落马击 Unseat} 专长 10

先决条件 骑兵入门

需求 你正骑乘坐骑，并且持握一件骑战（jousting）武器

你尝试将敌人从坐骑上击落。作出一次近战打击对抗正在骑乘的敌人。若你的攻击命中，尝试一次运动检定对抗敌人的强韧DC（Fortitude DC）。若成功，敌人会被你从坐骑上击落，根据敌人的选择落到与其坐骑相邻的一个方格内。若大成功，则敌人落地后会@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wijzB1FDUT7SC86a]{神威坐骑 Specialized Mount} 专长 14

先决条件 威武坐骑

你在非常规、甚至是极端环境下训练坐骑，使坐骑的能力远超其同类。你的坐骑根据你的选择获得一项特化。

特殊 你能够至多选取该专长3次。每次都将一项不同的特化添加到你的坐骑上。你的坐骑所拥有的特化不能超过3项。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.epNrbgmjZDjJe7Ry]{传奇骑手 Legendary Rider} 专长 20

先决条件 骑兵入门

你和坐骑能够像一个生物一般行动，如呼吸一般理解彼此的意图。当你骑乘在你的坐骑上时，就会获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}；你仅能使用额外动作进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{指挥动物 Command an Animal}技能动作来命令自己的坐骑。

Celebrity.name: 名人 Celebrity
Celebrity.description:
名人 Celebrity

你是个特殊的人，你熟知这一点。你不仅聚光灯下会感到舒适，而且还渴望这种感觉。通常意义的名人都是音乐家或者其他类型的表演者，不过你可以因任何行业而变得出名。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MNArjo5Z5LUYITQm]{名人入门 Celebrity Dedication} 专长 2

有越多地人关注你，你就会感到越满足，而你本人也会抓住每个别人表现得不够完美的机会来展示自己。

你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.F0JgJR2rXKOg9k1z]{抢镜 Upstage} 反应动作。此外，当你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{赚取收入 Earn Income}时，若工作（task）的等级比你的等级更高，则会在赚取收入的检定中获得+1环境加值。

特殊 直至选取另外两个名人变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Btu0tA6SEBS6K1hE]{不知疲倦 Never Tire} 专长 4

先决条件 名人入门

触发 你将要获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}状态

需求 至少有3名不是敌人的生物正在@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{注视 Observed}着你

只要你有观众，就能够继续表现自己。是的，你必须对自己的支持者尽责！

你将疲乏状态的效果延迟1分钟，或者直至你不再被专长要求中所需要的观众注视为止，以较先发生者为准。若疲乏状态具有持续时间，则会在延迟结束后再开始计算。在此能力结束时，你无法进一步延迟或防止疲乏状态。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gOHBzx5Rqa6TZcrm]{迷人注视 Mesmerizing Gaze} 专长 6

先决条件 名人入门

当你和他人眼神遇上时，他们无法将视线从你身上移开。

选择一名目标生物。该生物必须尝试一次意志豁免，失败则会陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，直至你的下个回合结束为止；此DC等同于你的职业DC或法术DC，以较高者为准。若该生物成功通过豁免，或者由于敌对动作而中断迷魂的话，则会在一天之内临时免疫你的迷人注视。

当你选取该专长时，它会获得奥术或异能特征；一旦你作出选择，就无法更改。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N0gJ4Q69nslbdXHg]{掌控注意力 Command Attention} 专长 10

先决条件 名人入门

你以自身的风格掌控着周遭所有注视你的人，确保其目光只会落在你的身上，直至你的下个回合结束为止。

当距你30尺内的生物尝试豁免检定对抗其他视觉效果时，他们会使用比自身投掷出的成功度更好1级的结果。

区域内的敌人在尝试使用视觉效果，且该效果牵涉到把自身的注意力聚焦到某个特定生物身上时，比如美杜莎的聚焦凝视（medusa’s Focus Gaze），他必须成功通过意志豁免对抗你的职业DC或法术DC（以较高者为准），才能以任何除你之外的生物为目标。

由于你持续分散他人的注意力，区域中的盟友甚至可以在不具有掩蔽的情况下尝试@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}。

Crystal Keeper.name: Crystal Keeper
Crystal Keeper.description:
Crystal Keeper

In the era before Earthfall, the elven people of Golarion exhibited a wide range of mastery over magic. A sect of elves who venerated the goddess Yuelral first developed the techniques of the crystal keeper, but this tradition has since been long forgotten by most of the world. There are those who still remember, though-PCs can gain access to the crystal keeper archetype from the tragic figure that haunts Jewelgate waystation in "Fires of the Haunted City."

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ELdUj5ihdivlgb3H]{Crystal Keeper Dedication} 专长 4

先决条件 trained in Elven Lore or Society

You can use Arcana, Occultism, Religion, or Society to Decipher Writing by meditating before a crystal, regardless of the type of writing. When you Decipher Writing and roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead, and when you Decipher Writing and roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Additionally, you gain resistance 10 to damage from hazards associated with crystals.

特殊 直至选取另外两个crystal keeper变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。
